page.title: 17Youth Hostel
page.content: This youth hostel has been here since 1931.The{present manager}has been here for 4 years and works by himself with no family.He has the permission to employ someone for 3 months.A{normal {working day}for him would be wake up and do breakfast at 8:00am,then he allocates jobs for the visitors.Then he opens again at 5:00pm and serves dinner.The visitors' food mainly comes from Bulk delivery but also he has to buy some goods from Street.He owns about 1/2 acre.He makes a profit of about Â£2000 excluding expenses.He wakes up at 7:00am to around midday and from 5:30pm to 11:30pm.He does not get any time to go on holiday while the hostel is open.He is an employed member of the Y.H.A.
